column4: i need to ask someone about wget. Any ideas where i can get some help about it?

: i suppose this is not the place for it but i will give it a try . I got a site . In this site there is some space where i can set a password that is being used for some other app. Can i use wget in order to change this password using cron ? i mean i want to have some schedule which alters the password every lets say 2 hours
you want to do html formular processing from the shell?
